title: 241 - I like a look of Agony
text: The Beads upon the ForeheadBy homely Anguish strung.

title: Carme 13
text: Haec si, inquam, attuleris, venuste noster,cenabis bene; nam tui Catulliplenus sacculus est aranearum.

title: Dante's canto VI
text: Ahi serva Italia, di dolore ostello,nave sanza nocchiere in gran tempesta,non donna di provincie, ma bordello!

title: Ddaeng (땡)
text: 여지껏 무시해줘 고맙다덕분에 스타디움, 돔, 빌보드많은 것을 덕분에 많이도 얻었다

title: Die Bücherverbrennung
text: Als das Regime befahl, Bücher mit schädlichem Wissenöffentlich zu verbrennen und überallOchsen gezwungen wurden, Karren mit Büchern zu den Scheiterhaufen zu ziehen,entdeckte ein verjagter Dichter, einer der besten,die Liste der Verurteilten,entsetzt, dass seine Bücher vergessen waren.

title: El Padre Suizo
text: y las venenosas zarzas pisaQue roen como tòsigos las plantasDel criminal, en el dominio lòbregoDonde andan sin cesar los asesinos!

title: In Taberna quando sumus
text: In taberna quando sumus,non curamus quid sit humus,sed ad ludum properamus,cui semper insudamus.
targetDesc: Playing and betting in the tavern

title: Ironic
text: Well, life has a funny way of sneaking up on youWhen you think everything's okay and everything's going rightAnd life has a funny way of helping you outWhen you think everything's gone wrongAnd everything blows up in your face

title: Leda and the Swan
text: How can those terrified vague fingers pushThe feathered glory from her loosening thighs?

title: Mica Van Gogh
text: Lui olio su tela, e creò dipintiTu olio su muscoli, e gare di body buildingLui paesane, modelle, prostituteTu passi le notti nel letto con il computer
targetDesc: The listener, which is not a real artist but pretends to be one

title: A livella
text: Ogn'anno, il due novembre, c'è l'usanza per i defunti andare al Cimitero. Ognuno ll'adda fà chesta crianza; ognuno adda tené chistu penziero.
targetDesc: The use of going to the cemetery on the 2nd of November

title: Silver Spoon (Bapsae=Crow-tit/뱁새)
text: 난 뱁새다리 (다리), 넌 황새다리 (새다리)걔넨 말하지, '내 다린 백만 불짜리' (불짜리)내 게 짧은데 어찌 같은 종목 하니? (What?)They say, '똑같은 초원이면 괜찮잖니' (Never, never, woo)

title: Sober
text: I don't wanna be the girl that has to fill the silenceThe quiet scares me 'cause it screams the truthPlease don't tell me that we had that conversationI won't remember, save your breath 'cause what's the use?

title: Spine Breaker (척추브레이커)
text: 21세기 계급은 반으로 딱 나눠져있는 자와 없는 자, 신은 자와 없는 자입은 자와 벗는 자, 또 기를 써서 얻는 자

title: The Letter
text: So I wrote you a word,and then another word,and another, and another,until I wrote you a sentence.

title: Usseewa (うっせぇわ)
text: ちっちゃな頃から優等生気づいたら大人になっていたナイフの様な思考回路持ち合わせる訳もなくでも遊び足りない 何か足りない困っちまうこれは誰かのせいあてもなくただ混乱するエイデイ

title: A mia moglie
text: You are like a thing that issimple, natural, and true,like the bread and the wine,like the sun and the air.

title: All Star
text: My world's on fire, how 'bout yours?That's the way I like it, and I'll never get bored

title: An Irish Airman forsees his death
text: The years to come seemed waste of breath,/A waste of breath the years behind/In balance with this life, this death.
targetDesc: The meaning and purpose of life
